name: The Room (itch) (Nyar)
description:
This game was created in under 48 hours for #asylumjam2015 and came within the top 5 games!

The Room is a truly terrifying low-rez first-person horror game, in which you must navigate ten rooms, and use an Aliens-style motion detector to avoid invisible monster which is known as The Beast.

You must use your motion detector to avoid the monster, collect the key and make it to the exit of ten rooms in under ten minutes.

The Room came within the top 5 games for #asylumjam2015, thanks to everyone who supported the game!

The Room was featured by Alpha Beta Gamer, check out their review here!

If you love free horror games, why don't you check out my free horror-series in the

Shi No Mori: Ultimate Edition?

--

The Room is currently version 1.0.2.

Version 1.1 is coming soon which includes randomized key locations, bug fixes and lots more improvements.

--

The Room is completely free to download and play, but the developers would appreciate a small donation :)
